data.title: Home, Work and the 3rd Space - Suzilla: Family Business Podcast
data.meta_description:
When you have a small business. We run an insurance office which means long hours and when you have a family what do you do? Well we built a space in our office. It was critical in our success for child care expenses and covid lock down. For us it never became a battle of office verses family. 
Last weekend we gathered the families of the office together and started designing the third space. We set aside a space in our office for our son at our first office and we are continuing that in the new office plus including our partners in the design. It’s a space that is neither work nor home but one that we can recharge and revitalize our attitude. I started out with acknowledging the most powerful person in the room.
data.text:
When you have a small business. We run an insurance office which means long hours and when you have a family what do you do? Well we built a space in our office. It was critical in our success for child care expenses and covid lock down. For us it never became a battle of office verses family.

Last weekend we gathered the families of the office together and started designing the third space. We set aside a space in our office for our son at our first office and we are continuing that in the new office plus including our partners in the design. It’s a space that is neither work nor home but one that we can recharge and revitalize our attitude. I started out with acknowledging the most powerful person in the room.
